name: Akisu demo
description:
Akisu - Demo

This is a 'work-in-progress' passion project that I'm very excited to share with you! 

In this demo you play as Akisu, a slime who must jump, stretch, shrink and utilize all of his unique abilities to maneuver his way through this treacherous warehouse!  

Akisu is a 2D platforming-adventure created with the Unity game engine.

Thanks for taking the time to check out my game, please let me know if you have any questions/concerns and I hope you enjoy!

Follow on Twitter!
